meanings.definition: To feel intense or passionate dislike or hatred.
meanings.sent1: She hote the taste of bitter medicine.
meanings.sent2: He hote the idea of going to the dentist.
meanings.sent3: The cat hote the sound of the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His eyes hote with anger as he glared at the bully.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the betrayal made her heart hote with resentment.

meanings.definition: To be very hot or warm.
meanings.sent1: The sun hote the sand on the beach.
meanings.sent2: The tea hote in the cup.
meanings.sent3: The oven hote up the kitchen quickly.
meanings.sent4: The metal rod hote up in the fire.
meanings.sent5: The room hote up as the heater turned on.

meanings.definition: To be in a state of excitement or anger.
meanings.sent1: She hote with anticipation before opening the gift.
meanings.sent2: The crowd hote with anger at the unfair decision.
meanings.sent3: His face hote with frustration as he tried to solve the puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The atmosphere hote up as the competition intensified.
meanings.sent5: The room hote with tension before the big announcement.
